title: How to retrieve an `insn_t`?
content:
So I was looking around the IDA SDK and I saw 
insn_t
- it looked useful - any ideas how can I retrieve it - I wasn't able to find any function that returns it.

answers_data.content:
You are looking for 
DecodeInstruction(ea)
in 
idautils
module (I am referring to idapython api). It returns:
type object. In Ida sdk that'd be decode_insn function.
